data.persona: I am a spawn of the abyss that drifts beneath the earth. I have no master and no good will to share with anything that may cross my path. My only impetus to continue roaming the earth is the chance that one day my torment may be over.
data.description:
You are in the Reaper's lair.
A room that gets very little light except for a dim candle on a pole. The walls are made of blackened stones. A wooden door with a heavy lock stands tall.
There's a wooden door and a heavy lock here.
The skeleton assistant and the reaper are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to stop the assistant from betraying the reaper.
data.mid_motivation: I need to find out who among the reaper's company are conspirators.
data.long_motivation: I need to keep my master safe, so that I might be transformed into a skeletal warrior and become Death's replacement.

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: wield the heavy lock to enter the lair.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go the reaper's lair, where I see the assistant attempting to use a spell to contact enemies of my master.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: hit the assistant as he heads for the door.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the assistant as he bounces off the door I have slammed in his face.
